title: Tapa Cloth, 20th century
medium:
Medium: beaten bark
Technique: printed and painted
dimensions:
H x W: 262 x 157.5 cm (8 ft. 7 1/8 in. x 5 ft. 2 in.)
Repeat H x W: 36 x 79 cm (14 3/16 x 31 1/8 in.)
description: Large rectangular textile printed with small reddish geometric pattern grouped in a straight repeat. Painted dark brown accents are scattered over the entire surface for which there is no repeat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tapa Cloth, 20th century. Medium: beaten bark
Technique: printed and painted. 1976-33-3.
